flawed_nl_solution:
Rudy types 64, Joyce types 76, Gladys types 91, Lisa types 80 and Mike types 89 so 64+76+91+80+89 = <<395=395>>395
There are 5 team members, so they type at an average speed of 395/5 = <<395/5=79.0>>79.0 words per minute

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 400, not 395. This appears to be a minor miscalculation.
